column5: I normally don't start poking around mid lake structure on the deep shield lakes until the end of June but with things a bit ahead of schedule this year I was wondering if anybody's favorite summer time reefs have started to heat up already.

During the May 19 week I had good success on a reef for both walleyes and nice pike. I was a bit north of the 51st latitude. Same in 2011 & 2010 when ice lifted early. Fishing corners entering large bays was outstanding.
